attributes.action: Clean up our roads. Create Truck Parking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more private industrial estates are stopping trucks parking on them with the use of clamping firms, therefore trucks line the roads of small villages and towns creating untold problems due to the lack of truck parks. If a truck delivers to a private industrial estate, that industrial estate should offer refuge to the truck and driver until the journey can be continued. Keeping our country lanes and layby's truck and litter free. Make the person recieving the load responsibe. Make our country lanes pretty again.
